title: Healing Danger
description: Ex-Special Forces commander Dane Bennett is now the team leader at Fortis Security. Protecting people is his job...until a serial killer targets Lauren Cassidy and makes it personal.Dane never imagined the woman whoâ€™d left him for another man, ripping away his chance at a family, would become his most dangerous client. Racing to keep Lauren safe from a deadly killer with an agenda, Dane makes a split-second decision. A decision neither of them may survive.
author: Maddie Wade
